name: Amorim Cork Composites
description:
Amorim Cork Composites is the leader company on innovative construction applications using cork, inside the Amorim Group, world leader on cork products.

Amorim Cork Composites developed and offers the AcoustiCORK® solutions – Natural and Sustainable Underlays&Underscreed – they’re easy-to-use, cost-effective and high performance alternative to synthetic products. They have been successfully installed throughout Europe, Middle East and USA.
 
Amorim Cork Composites has also introduced a new solution based – CORKwall® - based in cork granules to be used as a finishing coat and for rehabilitation of exterior facades and interior walls. Corkwall® behaves as an elastic membrane whose main function is to provide acoustic and thermal insulation to new build or building rehabilitation. This product acts as an effective thermal barrier preventing heat loss and visible cracks at the surface. The CORKwall® exterior also provides the final coating, allowing the customers to pick from a 16 colors palette.
